news_header: Zacks.com highlights key stocks and earnings trends, including Walmart, Visa, AbbVie, and AstroNova, amidst a growing nuclear energy opportunity.
news_original_title: The Zacks Analyst Blog Walmart, Visa, AbbVie and   AstroNova
news_text: Zacks.com has announced the latest featured stocks in its Analyst Blog, including Walmart, Visa, AbbVie, and AstroNova. The blog provides insights into the ongoing Q4 earnings season, with a significant number of S&P 500 companies reporting positive earnings growth. Walmart has seen strong performance due to its diverse business model and omnichannel strategy, while Visa continues to benefit from digital payment trends. AbbVie is navigating challenges post-Humira's exclusivity loss with new product launches. AstroNova faces difficulties but shows growth in its aerospace segment. Additionally, there is a growing focus on nuclear energy, with leaders from 22 countries committing to tripling nuclear capacity, presenting investment opportunities in related stocks.
